author: luc
msg: Added applyTo and applyInverseTo methods in the Rotation class that
handle directly arrays instead of Vector3D instances.

author: eyang
msg: AMBARI-129. Rename agent package reference of HMS to Ambari. (Eric Yang)

author: krosenvold
msg: [SUREFIRE-786] @Category not taken into account for forkMode=always
Testcase and initial patch by nkeywal. Extended fix to cover method-level
This also fixes a quite serious issue of custom provider properties
not making it into the provider upon forkMode=always, which
should close quite a few other issues too
